narrative.narrative: Great Lakes Airlines serves 48 of its destinations through the Essential Air Service program and is the largest Essential Air Service provider in the United States. They operate for other airlines also, which includes 24 1900D's in Frontier Airlines name and 6 EMB 120 Brasilias. They also operate as United Express.

prefereds.aircrafts: Beechcraft Queen Air B80,Beechcraft King Air B200,Beechcraft 1900C,Beechcraft 1900D,EMB 120 Brasilia
